root: ^My crush %FirstName:Npc:1% wants someone to bring a guitar to %Pron:1:3% party, I don’t have one but my brother does.
^Tell %FirstName:Npc:1% sorry, I don’t have a guitar
^Ask my brother to come with his guitar

res1: ^My brother says no, he won’t let me borrow it. We get in an argument, I go to the party and tell %FirstName:Npc:1% and %Pron:1:1% understands.
^I guess the party was alright, but I’m really annoyed with my brother for not letting me borrow the guitar. Apparently he thinks I’m going to break it.
res2: ^%FirstName:Nps:1% is thrilled with me and the party is fun but my brother and I get in a fight when I get home.
^I played the guitar pretty well at %FirstName:Npc:1%’s place and %Pron:1:3% party was great! But my brother got angry I took his guitar without permission and we got into a fight.
res3: ^My brother shows up to the party with a guitar and %FirstName:Npc:1% is mad I didn’t ask him in the first place.
^I can’t believe my brother showed up to the party anyway, I don’t know who invited him. But then he made me look so stupid in front of %FirstName:Npc:1%, I’m so annoyed with him!
res4: ^My brother joins me with his guitar and %FirstName:Npc:1% is so happy that her party goes well
^I’m so glad I asked my brother to join me at the party, it went great! Everyone had a great time! And he definitely plays his guitar better than I can. And %FirstName:Npc:1% was pleased with me!
